CustomField.formula: IF(AND(OR(Text(ShippingCountry__c) ='Sweden', Text(ShippingCountry__c) ='Netherlands', Text(ShippingCountry__c) ='Belgium', Text(ShippingCountry__c) ='Luxembourg'), OR(ShippingStreet__c = null,ShippingCity__c = null,Text(ShippingCountry__c) = null,ShippingPostalCode__c = null)),1,0)
CustomField.label: Validate ActivateShippingAddressRequired
